item.title: #TIL 2017-06-15 : Gearman bash worker and client
item.description: Gearman bash worker and client Gearman is a awesome job queue service that helps you scale your system. In smaller context, it can help us to run a background woker for minor tasks like backup data, cleaning system. Install : $ sudo apt install gearman-job-server gearman-tools Create a worker bash script worker.sh #!/bin/bash echo $1 echo $2 Run worker, -w means run as worker mode , -f test means function name will be test
